Question.Subject: i am unable to download vids from this site http://www.animeatom.com/watch-streaming-english-dubbed-cardcaptor?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
just download internet download manager and install in your system after then u can download videos from any site even you can download flash advertisement form any site.
you can download internet download manager (IDM) from download.com after instaling idm when u ll play any video on a site there ll be a option on upright side on the video just click on it and download
it will help u 1000000000%
